name: JB2A_DnD5e
title: JB2A - Jules&Ben's Animated Assets - Free Content
description:
This library of carefully crafted animated assets such as spell templates, tokens and tiles will bring life to your sessions. They are based on the DnD5e ruleset but can be used with other systems as you see fit.

Compendiums of actors and macros are also provided. Go to our FAQ and Troubleshooting section if you have a question or an issue. Join our Discord server for any further question or if you want to exchange with the community.


Previews of our assets available on Patreon.
Consider supporting us and unlocking more assets (color variations and more) by pledging as little as 1â‚¬ (per creation but you can set a maximum if you don't want to spend more than once your pledge amount per month) at https://www.patreon.com/JB2A
author: Gazkhan#8192 and Wassily#8035
